name: luminovang/luminova
description: Luminova is a fast, modular PHP framework designed for simplicity, performance, and modern web application development.

suggest.ext-curl: Required if using the CURLRequest class.
suggest.ext-exif: Required for image handling with the Image class.
suggest.ext-fileinfo: Improves MIME type detection for file uploads.
suggest.ext-gd: Required for image manipulation using GDHandler.
suggest.ext-imagick: Required for image manipulation using ImageMagickHandler.
suggest.ext-memcached: Required if using Memcached with the MemcachedHandler.
suggest.ext-intl: Required for locale and internationalization features.
suggest.psr/log: Needed for applications using PSR-compatible logging.
suggest.psr/http-client: Required when using HTTP clients like Guzzle or cURL.
suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: Required for using Guzzle as an HTTP client.
suggest.phpmailer/phpmailer: Required for sending emails using PHPMailer.
suggest.swiftmailer/swiftmailer: Required for sending emails using SwiftMailer.
suggest.smarty/smarty: Required to enable Smarty as a template engine.
suggest.twig/twig: Required to enable Twig as a template engine.
suggest.league/flysystem: Required for using cloud storage drivers via Flysystem.
suggest.nanoblocktech/psr-cache: Enables support for PSR-6 and PSR-16 caching.
suggest.peterujah/php-search-controller: Provides support for model search with BaseModel::doSearch().
suggest.peterujah/nano-image: Required for image resizing when using the FileDelivery::outputImage() method.
suggest.endroid/qr-code: Generates inline Base64 or SVG QRcodes when using TOTP class.
suggest.luminovang/array-functions: Backports PHP 8.4 array_* functions for older versions.
suggest.opis/closure: Required for storing closures in the BackgroundTaskQueue system.

scripts-descriptions.post-update-cmd: Runs after 'composer update' to apply Luminova-specific updates and configurations.
scripts-descriptions.post-create-project-cmd: Initializes project setup after installation, including application key generation.
scripts-descriptions.analyze-app: Runs PHPStan to statically analyze the application and framework codebase.
scripts-descriptions.analyze-code: Performs code quality checks and detects structural issues using Rector in dry-run mode.
scripts-descriptions.cs-fix: Automatically fixes PHP coding style issues using PHP-CS-Fixer.
